Export.zv: IRIS for UNIX (Ubuntu Server LTS for x86-64 Containers) 2023.3 (Build 254U)

Class.name: SC.Data.GlobalRegionLookup
Class.Copyright: /* Copyright (c) 2022 by InterSystems Corporation. Cambridge, Massachusetts, U.S.A. All rights reserved. Confidential property of InterSystems Corporation. */
Class.Description: Global region is not a standard field in SAP but it is used by O9. Locations will be mapped to their global regions based on their country. This table is based on three global regions (AMS, EMEA, and APJ), but this mapping could be customized based on future client needs.

Class.name: SC.Data.Product
Class.Copyright: /* Copyright (c) 2022 by InterSystems Corporation. Cambridge, Massachusetts, U.S.A. All rights reserved. Confidential property of InterSystems Corporation. */
Class.Description:
This object is used to capture master data of a product. A product can be the final product made and sold by a company, it can also be a part used to make the final product. One can use product type attributes to differential different type of products (such as final products vs parts/items).
Extensions to this object were made to meet o9 requirements for demand planning model.

Class.name: SC.Data.SalesOrder
Class.Copyright: /* Copyright (c) 2022 by InterSystems Corporation. Cambridge, Massachusetts, U.S.A. All rights reserved. Confidential property of InterSystems Corporation. */
Class.Description:
This object is used to capture sales order information. This object is used together with SalesOrderLine object (which captures the line details of the order.)
Extensions to this object were made to meet o9 requirements for demand planning model.

Class.name: SC.Data.SalesOrderLine
Class.Copyright: /* Copyright (c) 2022 by InterSystems Corporation. Cambridge, Massachusetts, U.S.A. All rights reserved. Confidential property of InterSystems Corporation. */
Class.Description:
This object is used to capture sales order line details. An order can have one or multiple order lines. There can be different types of lines, such as a line for a product, and another line for a service. Order line is also linked to sales shipment lines for shipment tracking.
Extensions to this object were made to meet o9 requirements for demand planning model.

Class.name: SC.Data.SalesShipmentLine
Class.Copyright: /* Copyright (c) 2022 by InterSystems Corporation. Cambridge, Massachusetts, U.S.A. All rights reserved. Confidential property of InterSystems Corporation. */
Class.Description:
This object is used to capture line details of a sales shipment. It also provide the link to the corresponding sales order line if order information is available. Although product info can be specified directly in this object (which is important when order information is not available), it is preferred to get product info from the corresponding sales order lines.
Extensions to this object were made to meet o9 requirements for demand planning model.
